DrupalCon is the official conference of the Drupal community, designed to attract an international audience since Drupal became an open source project in 2001. It\'s produced by the Drupal Association and a fabulous group of volunteers from across the globe.

This is an open source mobile application for DrupalCon, first built for DrupalCon Prague 2013.

Created by

@TimLeytens
@swentel
@LeenVS
